name: Seattle Bucket List
description: An Express application that allows users to add details about places and activities to explore in the Seattle area.

name: Holiday Binge Buddy
description: This full stack application was built with Django, Postgres, React, and Bootsrap. It allows users to browse a list of user-submitted shows and view details about the special holiday episodes the show aired.

name: City Fyndr
description: City Fyndr is a full-stack MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) application with full CRUD capability. It allows users to explore relevant data about the top 50 cities to live in the United States.
